item.title: Getting interested in Python
item.description: by AN This lecture draws extensively from Seaborn tutorials. The best way to run it, is to use Collaboratory from Google. # Colaboratory has an old version of seaborn, so let's upgrade !pip install seaborn --upgrade import seaborn as sns sns.set(style="ticks") import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt Why plotting? We will use Ascombe’s quartet build in into Seaborn to answer this questions # Load the example dataset for Anscombe's quartet df = sns.
